name: Witching Hour (Skylarr)
description:
One of the organizers of the Trick or Treat jam gave a 1 hour extension after I had submitted my original game, so I decided to do what any sane human would do and MAKE ANOTHER GAME IN THAT 1 HOUR WITH BEGINNER LEVEL EXPERIENCE.

It was really fun.

You are the orange square, collect the purple "candies" to gain score, higher score is better. That's really all.
